StyleCategoryDef.label: Saxhleel Traditional Apparel
StyleCategoryDef.description: Traditional Saxhleel clothing featuring natural materials, earth tones, and patterns that mirror the scales and textures of Black Marsh. Incorporates Hist-bark fibers and swamp-dyed fabrics.

StyleCategoryDef.label: An-Xileel Militant Apparel
StyleCategoryDef.description: Military-style clothing of the An-Xileel, featuring tactical designs, earth-tone camouflage patterns, and reinforced protection suitable for guerrilla warfare in marsh environments.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Shadowscale Hidden Apparel
StyleCategoryDef.description: The stealthy clothing of Shadowscale assassins, featuring dark colors, form-fitting designs, and materials that enhance stealth and mobility while maintaining deadly efficiency.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Hist Keeper Sacred Apparel
StyleCategoryDef.description: Sacred vestments of the Hist Keepers, featuring natural materials blessed by Hist sap, flowing designs that mirror root patterns, and colors that reflect the sacred connection to nature.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Thornscale Warrior Apparel
StyleCategoryDef.description: Intimidating warrior gear of the Thornscale clan, featuring ritualistic war paint, spiked armor elements, and designs that project strength and fearsome reputation in battle.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Glade Runner Scout Apparel
StyleCategoryDef.description: Practical scouting gear of the Glade Runners, featuring lightweight materials, camouflage patterns suitable for marsh terrain, and designs optimized for mobility and stealth reconnaissance.

StyleCategoryDef.label: Root-Whisper Ancient Apparel
StyleCategoryDef.description: Ancient traditional clothing of the Root-Whisper tribe, featuring primitive but sophisticated designs using only natural materials and traditional dyeing methods passed down through generations.
